attributes.action: Extend mortgage and payment holidays for those not entitled to universal credit
attributes.additional_details: All the people in the middle working people owning their own home who are working have been affected but all we’ve been given is 3 months and then extended by 3 months payment holidays after which our credit score would be affected. We’re missing universal free meals and just get on with it. The additional UC bonus or uplift shouldn’t be given to people who were on it prior to covid- so when People return to work their money pays for this additional money
attributes.background: There are many of us who do not fall into the universal credit bracket who receive no help financially. Doesn’t mean we haven’t struggled just that we have been self sufficient in sourcing financial support and probably ended up In debt!! Most claiming UC have the same circumstances pre covid
